text: allāhanalli mattu paralōkadalli nambike iruvavaru allāh mattu avana dūtara śatrugaḷondige snēha beḷesuvudannu nīvendū kāṇalāriri – avaru, tam'ma hettavaru athavā tam'ma putraru athavā tam'ma sahōdararu athavā tam'ma bandhugaḷāgiddarū sariyē. Allāhanu avara manas'sugaḷalli viśvāsada mudreyotti biṭṭiruvanu mattu avanu tanna kaḍeyinda viśēṣa caitan'yavannodagisi avarige neravāgiruvanu. Mattu avanu avarannu, taḷadalli nadigaḷu hariyuvantaha svarga tōṭagaḷoḷage sērisuvanu. Avaru avugaḷalli sadākāla iruvaru. Allāhanu avarinda santuṣṭanāgiruvanu mattu avaru avaninda santuṣṭarāgiruvaru. Avarē allāhana baḷagadavaru. Nimage tiḷidirali, allāhana baḷagadavarē vijayigaḷāguvaru
